Function Documentation

void OPA_Cmd ( HT_OPA_TypeDef *  HT_OPAn,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the specified OPA peripheral.

Parameters:
HT_OPAn,:where HT_OPAn is the selected OPA from the OPA peripherals, x can be 0 or 1.
NewState,:new state of the HT_OPAn peripheral. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None
